NGUYEN ANH THANG
AI ENGINEER
EDUCATION / COURSES
Supervise Learning Specialization
CS131 – Standford (Computer Vision Foun-
dations and Applications)
� June 2017 – Aug 2017
CS231 – Standford (Convolutional Neural
Networks for Visual Recognition)
� Aug 2017 – Oct 2017
CS188 – Berkeley (Deep Reinforcement
Learning)
� Oct 2017 – Dec 2017
Bachelor in Electronic and Telecom-
munication
HaNoi University of Science and Technol-
ogy
� Expected June 2019
PROJECTS
Blind Application
• Develop an algorithm to detect page of a book
and instruct the Blind to take the photo prop-
erly.
• Different camera angle, position, type of back-
ground and time of detection were the major
challenges. The accuracy on our test database
is more than 80 percent.
Surveillance Camera
• Develop, modify and implement a robust deep
neural network that can detect human and
process directly on Smart Camera.
Face Recognition
• Develop a neural network that classify more
than 5000 types of face.
• Achieve more than60% accuracy on a celebrity
dataset using VGG as the core network with
Adam optimization.
Human Action Recognition
• Develop an LSTM based model to classify and
forecast Human action from camera data.
EXPERIENCE
Machine Learning Engineer
MPECLab
� Sep 2017 – Present
� HaNoi, VietNam
• Research and develop the Computer Vision algorithms which
instruct the blind to capture the book properly then combine
with Deep network to convert the captured image to text, then
text to speech.
• Research and develop the Deep Learning models to detect hu-
man for surveillance system which requires whole process to
run real time on Smart Camera.
• Leading the team on the training and evaluation of Deep Neural
Network models.
• Experience with performance analysis, optimization and bench-
mark evaluations.
Software Engineer
TOPICA
� Jul 2017 – Sep 2017
� HaNoi, VietNam
• Develop Web Application for Mentor Management.
Language: Python | FrameWork: Django

goDB

bassy

Python, Keras, Tensorﬂow, Darknet, OpenCV ○ ○ ○ ○ ○

Java, Latex, SQL Database
